trans-unit.source: +2: Each player draws a card. −1: Target player draws a card. −10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of their library into their graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: SS1·2 | Blue Elemental Blast | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose one — • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

trans-unit.resname: SS1·2 | Blue Elemental Blast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Contrary to popular wisdom, I find it's best to fight fire with its opposite."
Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
"I have a plan. Actually, I have three."

Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
"It's not just what you know. It's knowing where to find what you don't."

trans-unit.resname: SS1·8 | Threads of Disloyalty | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature with converted mana cost 2 or less You control enchanted creature.

trans-unit.resname: SS1·8 | Threads of Disloyalty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Every thought is a string. You just have to find the right ones to pull."
